rules: Do NOT use bracketed numbers for citations (e.g., [1], [2]). Integrate links naturally into the text.
Do NOT use markdown bolding (**text**) or italics (*text*). Use Capitalization for emphasis if needed.
Always include 3-5 relevant hashtags at the end.
Images must be specific, authentic, and high-quality (Macro, Editorial, Cinematic). Avoid generic stock photos.
Tone should be professional, authoritative, yet accessible. Avoid AI cliches like 'delve', 'unlock', 'game-changer'.
